description: Try our easy to follow Paprika & Garlic Crusted Lamb recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast lamb,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Paprika & Garlic Crusted Lamb Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g kipfler potatoes, scrubbed and halved lengthways (or red rascal)
1 bunch spring onions, trimmed and halved lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Place lamb into a large roasting pan.
Combine garlic, paprika and 1 tablespoon olive oil in a small bowl. Rub paprika mixture over lamb. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Cover with a sheet of baking paper.
Combine potato, spring onion, lemon, oregano and remaining olive oil in a large bowl.
Place potato around lamb and roast for 1 hour.
Transfer lamb to a chopping board, cover and stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
Serve lamb with vegetables and drizzle with pan juices.
